# pix2tobii { #DeToX.pix2tobii }

```python
pix2tobii(win, p)
```

Convert PsychoPy pixel coordinates to Tobii ADCS coordinates.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name   | Type                   | Description                                                          | Default    |
|--------|------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| win    | psychopy.visual.Window | The PsychoPy window which provides information about units and size. | _required_ |
| p      | tuple                  | The PsychoPy pixel coordinates to convert.                           | _required_ |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type   | Description                           |
|--------|--------|---------------------------------------|
|        | tuple  | The converted Tobii ADCS coordinates. |

## Notes {.doc-section .doc-section-notes}

The conversion is done by dividing the pixel coordinates by the window size
and adding 0.5 to the x and y coordinates to center the origin at the
middle of the screen.
